content: Today at Google I/O we shared our latest AI advancements and how we're making them helpful for everyone. Excited about the future of AI and its potential to solve important challenges.
Proud to announce that Google has achieved 100% carbon-neutral operations for the fourth year in a row. Our goal remains to operate on carbon-free energy 24/7 by 2030.
Congratulations to our Google DeepMind team on the breakthrough achievements with AlphaFold. This technology has the potential to revolutionize how we discover new medicines and understand diseases.
Today we introduced iPhone 15 with groundbreaking features that will empower users to create and connect in new ways. Innovation is in Apple's DNA and we're excited to continue pushing boundaries.
Apple is committed to protecting our planet. On Earth Day and every day we're working toward our goal of becoming 100% carbon neutral across our entire business by 2030.
Thrilled to open our first Apple Store in Mumbai. India is an incredibly dynamic market and we're proud to bring the best of Apple to our customers there.
Today we're introducing Meta AI - our most advanced assistant built on our new Llama 3 model. It's available on Facebook Instagram WhatsApp and now on the web too.
The metaverse is the next frontier. We're building technologies that will connect people in entirely new ways and create new opportunities for creators and businesses.
Excited to share that Meta has been recognized as one of the best places to work in tech. Our success is built on our incredible team and their commitment to our mission.
Adobe MAX is back and better than ever! Join us for three days of creativity inspiration and learning with the world's top creators and innovators.
Today we announced Adobe's new AI features in Creative Cloud that will empower creators to work faster and more efficiently while maintaining creative control. The future of creativity is here.
After nearly 25 years at Google and 9 years as YouTube CEO I've decided to step back and focus on my family health and personal projects. It's been an honor to lead such an incredible platform.

Supporting women in tech has been a lifelong passion. Today I had the privilege of speaking with young women coders about building careers in technology. Their enthusiasm gives me hope for the future.
As my time at Twitter comes to a close I want to express my gratitude to the incredible team I've had the privilege to work with. I'm proud of what we accomplished together.
Innovation thrives when diverse perspectives come together. I'm proud of the engineering culture we've built focused on collaboration technical excellence and solving complex problems.
Excited to announce the publication of my new book about Netflix's unique culture and how it's driven our success. Hope it provides valuable insights for leaders and organizations.
The streaming revolution has transformed how people consume entertainment. As I reflect on Netflix's journey I'm amazed at how far we've come and excited about the future of storytelling.
SpaceX successfully launched Starship today - a major milestone on our journey to Mars. Congratulations to the incredible SpaceX team for their dedication and innovation.
Tesla Cybertruck deliveries begin next month. This revolutionary vehicle will change the future of transportation with unmatched performance durability and functionality.
At NVIDIA GTC 2023 we unveiled our next-generation AI chips and platforms designed to accelerate the AI revolution across industries. Join us in building the future of computing.
Introducing the GeForce RTX 4090 - our most powerful gaming GPU ever. Designed for gamers creators and AI researchers who demand uncompromising performance.
AI is transforming every industry from healthcare to manufacturing to transportation. NVIDIA is proud to provide the computing platform powering this revolution.
